title: White Taper Candles - 30 Pack Unscented 10 Inch Dinner Candle Set -7-8 Hours Burn Time - Smokeless and Dripless Household, Wedding, Party, Home Décor Candlesticks
features: Package contains 30 classic 10 inch white dinner taper candles that will compliment any home decor style
Taper candles are poured with quality paraffin wax and feature a dripless 7 hour extended burn time
Dinner candles are made with 100% cotton lead free wicks for a clean smokeless burn
Each taper candle measures 0.8" in diameter and will fit most standard candle stick holders and candelabras
Classic candles are perfect for romantic restaurant settings, special events, parties, and religious ceremonies
description: tall 10" unscented dripless 30 pack taper candles are the perfect complement to any home decor style. Each dinner candle measures 0.8 inches in diameter and 10 inches in height. Their universal size will fit almost any candlestick or candelabra. Taper candles are machine poured with quality paraffin creating a dripless burn that lasts for up to 7 hours long. Each candle also comes with a 100% cotton lead free wick for a clean smokeless burn. These classic candles are perfect for creating a romantic restaurant setting, decorative wedding decor, or a relaxing spa atmosphere. Candles can be used indoors or outdoors for parties, religious ceremonies, special occasions, and emergencies.
